title: Product
description: XDM product variant, master product and key attributes of product in the product catalog.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: The internal unique ID of the variant in the commerce backend system.

SKU.title: SKU
SKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the variant assigned by the vendor.

description.title: Description
description.description: The localized description of the product.

category.title: Category
category.description: Primary categorization (category) name of the Master/variant.

department.title: Department
department.description: Primary department the product is associated with.

masterProductId.title: Master Product Identifier
masterProductId.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

masterProductSKU.title: Master Product SKU
masterProductSKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the master product assigned by the vendor or manufacturer(to update).

masterProductName.title: Master Product Name
masterProductName.description: The localized name of the product.

fabrication.title: Fabrication
fabrication.description: Primary material the product is constructed with.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Gender the product is marketed to. [male,female,unisex,unknown].

size.title: Size
size.description: Standard product size for the product.

unitOfMeasure.title: Unit of Measure
unitOfMeasure.description: Standard unit of measure of the varient. Denotes the units for the size measurement.

countryOfOrigin.title: Country of Origin
countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin as defined by customs requirements.

COGS.title: Cost of Good Sold
COGS.description: Cost of Good Sold. In the currencyCode currency.

listPrice.title: List Price
listPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting. In the currencyCode currency.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for cost and pricing.

originalSaleDate.title: Original Sale Date
originalSaleDate.description: First date the product was made available for sale. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productCreateDate.title: Product Creation Date
productCreateDate.description: The date when this product varient was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productLastModified.title: Product Last Modified
productLastModified.description: The date when this product varient was last modified. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

productURL.title: Product URL
productURL.description: The URL for the primary Product View of the product varient page.
